title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Deck Tool
description: Estimate deck prices using .ydk files or search. Includes full card images, pricing, and analysis tools.

title: File Converter Tool
description: Convert documents and audio files to other formats like PDF or MP3. Built with Flask and React.

title: URL Shortener
description: Shorten long URLs into clean, shareable links. Lightweight, fast, and simple with analytics-ready support.

title: JSON Formatter
description: Format and validate JSON instantly with error checking and pretty print support for quick debugging.

title: Markdown Previewer
description: Write Markdown and preview formatted output in real time. Ideal for blogging, docs, and quick edits.

title: Misu - Discord Bot
description: Card-focused Discord bot with trading logic, slash commands, and image generation built in Python.

title: Skynet - Discord Bot
description: Blocks hate speech and malicious links using OpenAI and VirusTotal. Built for secure Discord servers.

title: Jeb - Discord Bot
description: Play music from YouTube with queue controls and interactive embeds. Powered by ffmpeg and Python.
